head.title: Travel Insurance
head.description: We believe that you should always have fond memories of your holidays. The cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price.

content.text:
We believe that you should always have fond memories of your holidays. That’s why we offer you ERV cancellation insurance. You may also choose an optional upgrade of your insurance cover with ERV travel cover.

Your cover before travelling: ERV cancellation insurance

Cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price. The deductible for each claim amounts to 20% of the reimbursable loss. You can find further details in the terms and conditions of ERV cancellation insurance.

Your cover when travelling: ERV travel insurance

Get the most out of your insurance cover:

  • Reimbursement of unused travel services and additional return travel costs if cancelled
  • Reimbursement for medical treatment worldwide
  • Reimbursement of search, rescue and recovery costs
  • Organization and reimbursement of ambulance and luggage transport
  • Luggage insurance

    

Premium per reservation: EUR 35,-

We recommend that you also consider the ERV travel insurance, in order to benefit from additional cover and services. You can find further details in the terms and conditions of ERV travel insurance.

Booking

ERV cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price. ERV travel insurance can be added to your accommodation booking directly during the booking process. If you have already booked your holiday you can book ERV travel insurance subsequently up until your day of arrival by calling our hotline on 0840 84 88 88. 

Claim documents (for bookings from 01.01.2018)

In the case of loss a claim can be made by filling out the corresponding form:

  • Medical and hospital costs ILLNESS
  • Medical and hospital costs ACCIDENT
  • Luggage – theft / robbery / miscarriage
  • SOS protection for travel incidents
  • Cancellation costs

  

   

Claim documents (for bookings up to 31.12.2017)

 Allianz cancellation insurance:

• Claim Advice Allianz cancellation insurance and Doctor's Report - Cancellation Charges-Insurance (in case of a booking cancellation)

Allianz travel insurance:
• Claim Advice Baggage Insurance
• Claim Advice ASSISTANCE Insurance (in case of an event during the booking)

content.headline: Så sikker er du i ferieboligen!

elements.title: Kun kvalitetssikrede sommerhuse
elements.subtitle: Kvalitet er vores primære prioritet
elements.caption: Hver ejendom kontrolleres før ankomst for at sikre det bedst mulige ophold

elements.title: Garanteret tilgængelighed og service på stedet
elements.subtitle: Få mest muligt ud af vores ekspertise
elements.caption: Nøgle-administration er arrangeret af vores hjælpsomme personale. Tilgængelig døgnet rundt eller på stedet for at hjælpe dig med alle dine spørgsmål, såsom: med tips og viden om dit feriemål og din reserverede bolig.

elements.title: En mindeværdig ferie oplevelse
elements.subtitle: Privatliv og frihed i dit eget feriehus
elements.caption: Vær din egen chef, spis når du vil og har masser af plads til alle dine venner og familie

elements.title: Hvorfor Interhome?
elements.caption: Det har aldrig været nemmere at finde den perfekte ferie. Vil du opleve nye feriedestinationer? Der er ingen bedre måde at gøre det på end ved at have sin egen feriebolig: Nyd "la dolce vita" i Italien, oplev den charmerende livsstil på den Franske Riviera eller nyd den måde at leve på. Find inspiration i vores ferie tips og book online - det er hurtigt, let og sikkert med Interhome.

elements.title: Frihed, integritet og plads i dit eget feriehus
elements.caption: At have sit eget feriehus eller lejlighed giver masser af fordele: Du kan bruge tiden præcis som du vil. Der er ikke forstyrrelser fra andre gæster eller hotelpersonalet - du kan holde ferie efter dine helt egne regler. Uanset om du leder efter en byferie, en afslappende ferie med familie eller med dine venner. Nyd at have masser af plads, fleksibilitet og frihed i din egen feriebolig.
